Fuck AI.

If anything, comparing it to drugs was unfair to drugs. Drugs can at least have meaningful roles in religious practices, and the hallucinations drugs give you are at least real experiences. 

genAI has nothing to offer anyone except a shortcut to being stupider.

A thing that's bad for you, that you shouldn't do, that creates a dependency and diminishes your abilities to live a normal life without it. One that is severely socially stigmatized and can harm your relationships, but makes you feel good?

Nah. Can't imagine why I'd see them as comparable.
He still thinks the other country pays the tariff. He doesn't know how they work.

There are over one billion knowledge workers, and these are concentrated in higher-income countries. If we imagine that access to cutting-edge AI costs roughly $200 a month per employee (an amount which would certainly be worth paying given median wages of ~$30,000 and productivity boost of >1.5)...

It seems likely that these tools will soon accelerate such that their use will be made mandatory by companies. Once studies are carried out showing that worker productivity can increase by whole-number factors then which company would not institute such a mandate?

Claude Code with Opus 4.5 is already a significant productivity boost for knowledge workers (50%?). Soon, several labs will release models more powerful than Claude Opus 4.5, and improve their CC-like harnesses. Knowledge worker productivity will accelerate.

Mehr Details im Bildtext.

#TombRaiderKing #DogulWang #Anime #Webtoon #QWER #Altraverse #AnimeNews

images.alt:
Mit einem Trailer wurde heute bekannt gegeben, dass der Fantasy-Action-Webtoon »Dogul Wang« von Sanjijiksong (Original Story), Yoonz (Story) und 3B2S (Illustrationen) eine Anime-Adaption erhält. Passend dazu wurden ein Visual sowie der Opening-Song »Show Down« von der südkoreanische Gruppe QWER zur Ankündigung vorgestellt. Die Reihe lief in Südkorea von Januar 2019 bis März 2023 auf KakaoPage und umfasst 411 Kapitel (Mit Side Story), die in bislang 13 Bänden zusammengefasst wurde. Der Webtoon ist hierzulande bei Altraverse auf Deutsch erhältlich. Die Anime-Adaption startet im Juli 2026 im japanischen TV. Zusätzlich wurden die Mitwirkenden der Produktion sowie der japanische Sprechercast offiziell vorgestellt.

Tomb Raider King entsteht nach der Vorlage von Sanjijiksong und Yuns (REDICE STUDIO), mit dem originalen Charakterentwurf von P-crush (3B2S studio). Woo Seung Wook (Key Animation bei One Punch Man) übernimmt die Regie und Series Composition, das Charakterdesign stammt von Lee Hyun Joung, der zusätzlich als Chief Animation Director fungiert, unterstützt von Heo Hyung Jun. Für die Musik ist Kim Ju Young zuständig, während Yoon Gun und Kisuke Koizumi als Sound Director beteiligt sind. Produziert wird die Animation bei STUDIO EEK.

🎶 OP 》„Show Down“ von QWER

🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Ryoga Goriki« von Yoshimasa Hosoya
»Irene Holton« von Saori Hayami
»Yasumasa Okawara« von Junichi Suwabe

📜 Beschreibung 》
Überall auf der Welt tauchen plötzlich „Göttergräber“ auf, in denen mächtige Relikte schlummern. Während manche Menschen dadurch zu legendären Kämpfern werden, geraten andere unter die Kontrolle der Relikt-Nutzer und werden versklavt. Inmitten dieses Chaos tritt ein berüchtigter Grabräuber auf den Plan, der es nicht darauf anlegt zu retten, sondern zu plündern: der Tomb Raider King. Für ihn gilt nur ein Gesetz: Was du besitzt, gehört bald mir – und was mir gehört, bleibt mir.

images.alt:
Mit einem Teaser-Trailer wurde heute bekannt gegeben, dass der Action-Manga »Iwamoto-senpai no Suisen« von Hiroshi Shiibashi eine Anime-Adaption erhält. Passend dazu wurden ein Visual sowie eine neue Illustration von Hiroshi Shiibashi zur Ankündigung veröffentlicht. Die Reihe läuft in Japan seit Februar 2021 im Ultra Jump Magazin von Shueisha und umfasst bislang 12 Bände. Der Manga ist derzeit weder auf Englisch noch auf Deutsch erhältlich. Ein Starttermin für die Anime-Adaption ist noch nicht bekannt. Zusätzlich wurden die Mitwirkenden der Produktion sowie der japanische Sprechercast offiziell vorgestellt.

Die Anime-Adaption entsteht unter der Regie von Toshifumi Kawase (u. a. Blade of the Immortal), während Keiichiro Ochi (The Quintessential Quintuplets) für Series Composition verantwortlich ist. Das Charakterdesign stammt von Atsuko Nakajima (Ranma ½, Inuyasha). Als Sound Director ist Takuya Hiramitsu beteiligt, die Musik komponieren Yoshiaki Dewa (Call of the Night) und Toru Ishizuka. Produziert wird der Anime bei Studio DEEN (Fate/stay night, KonoSuba).

🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Iwamoto Kodo« von Taito Ban
»Kai Harumachi« von Yuki Sakakihara
»Soichiro Amaha« von Kento Ito

📜 Beschreibung 》
Japan in den 1910er Jahren: Der Mittelschüler Iwamoto Kodo besucht eine militärisch geführte Kadettenschule und wird im Auftrag der Armee quer durchs Land geschickt, um paranormale Vorfälle zu untersuchen. In einem Dorf, in dem angeblich „schwarzer Schnee“ fällt, begegnet er einem Jungen mit besonderen Kräften, der diese für eine Krankheit hält. Durch Iwamotos Hilfe erkennt der Junge, dass die beiden mehr verbindet, als sie ahnen, und erhält eine Empfehlung für die Schule. Auf jeder Reise wartet ein neues Rätsel - und zwischen Geheimnissen und Begegnungen entfaltet sich langsam eine romantische Geschichte dieser Zeit.

value.text:
I have some more bad news. 

If an admissions committee even suspects you used ChatGPT for your application letter, they'll almost certainly decide not to waste a precious admissions spot on you.

Instead they'll give it to, you know, someone who actually likes to write and knows how to do it.

I have some bad news. One, if you need to use ChatGPT for your graduate application letter, you are not ready for graduate school.

Two, no, not "everyone is doing it" and those who don't do it aren't "losing out." ChatGPT is not an advantage.

OpenAI to test ads in ChatGPT as it burns through billions

Financial pressures and changing tunes OpenAI's advertising experiment reflects the enormous financial pressures facing the company. OpenAI does not expect to be profitable until 2030 and has committed to spending about $1.4 trillion on…

external.description: Financial pressures and changing tunes OpenAI's advertising experiment reflects the enormous financial pressures facing the company. OpenAI does not expect to be profitable until 2030 and has committed to spending about $1.4 trillion on large data centers and chips for AI. OpenAI is expected to spend about $9 billion this year, while generating $13 billion in revenue, according to financial documents obtained by The Wall Street Journal in November. Only 5 percent of ChatGPT's 800 million weekly users pay for a subscription, so it's not enough to cover all of OpenAI's operating costs.
external.title: OpenAI to test ads in ChatGPT as it burns through billions

record.text: Agree that emphasizing self harm to learning (which will set one up for failure in the future) is more effective than hectoring about morality of using AI and setting rules that can't be enforced. This is the language I have in my syllabus

images.alt: A subnote on AI: No use was made of ChatGPT or any other artificial intelligence LLM in developing this class, including designing the syllabus and preparing lectures. And I commit to not using AI for any aspect of grading or student evaluation. (If you want to pay for a shitty AI generated and graded class by a professor too lazy to do their job there are lots of options at the Anderson School.) Students should also not use AI programs for work in this class, including summarizing readings and lectures. Given their deficiencies, if used they will likely result in a poor grade. But more importantly, learning occurs through active engagement with ideas and arguments. Relying on AI in place of the cognitive work that this entails is first and foremost a form of self-harm that undermines the ability to develop skills and habits of mind necessary to effectively think through complex issues and topics beyond the classroom, which is the point of education.

What makes this statement by Emmanuel Macron so unprecedented is, for the first time, a leading European ally is equating Trump with Putin.

“No intimidation or threat will influence us - neither in Ukraine, nor in Greenland, nor anywhere else in the world.”

EVERYTHING has changed.

images.alt:
The final part of Macron’s statement published on his Instagram account. It reads:

No intimidation or threat will influence us—neither in Ukraine, nor in Greenland, nor anywhere else in the world when we are confronted with such situations.

Tariff threats are unacceptable and have no place in this context.

Europeans will respond in a united and coordinated manner should they be confirmed. We will ensure that European sovereignty is upheld.

Eating cheese arguably leads to addiction and harm, but nobody preaches against eating it.

Once again, we don't need to be precious about this.

It's called "showing instead of telling."

Instead of being condescendingly dogmatic and preachy about something, you show a real world example of how that something is harmful.
Comparing ChatGPT to hard drugs is a bad-faith leap.
The dialogue with ChatGPT 5.2 proved extremely valuable, particularly for Aikido, offering new perspectives including practical movement.

images.alt: An older dwarf with deathly pale skin stands with his arms across his chest. He has a thick black mustache and neatly trimmed goatee, and long wavy hair to his shoulders. He is wearing a black shirt with golden jewelry over it resembling vertebra and a human ribcage. His black coat has lapels decorated with dark green and light green designs with golden embroidery on the lapels and on the edges of the coat itself. The coat has tails and a dark magenta lining. He is also wearing a magenta sash and wide black pants that seem to be of the 1860s style. His shoes are black leather with golden accents. One of his hands across his chest is turning to black marble at the end, and he has magical gold finger attachments to retain the mobility and sensation in his fingers. He is wearing a golden ring with a purple stone on his left hand.

images.alt:
On the right: This tarot card shows a man and a woman at a bar, sharing a loving gaze towards each other. The woman is a half-drow, with purple skin and long, wavy white hair. She is sitting on top of the bar counter wearing white, Edwardian style undergarments: a ruffly chemise, a corset, and drawers. Her hand sits on the man's shoulder. The man has dark skin and black hair, and holds her waist and thigh as his head rests near her breast. He is dressed in a bartender's outfit with a stiff collar, wide black tie and a white shirt with the sleeves rolled up to his elbows. Behind them, the bar is made from wood and a myriad of glass bottles filled with alcohol line the shelves. The image is encased in a frame in the style of Art Nouveau, labeled as the Tarot 06: The Lovers.

On the left: This tarot card shows a drow woman standing in the night, bright moonlight shining down on her. She is in the process of taking off, or putting on her hood. Her short, wavy white hair is lit by the moonlight, as well as the her nose, with the rest of her face covered in shadow. Her silver eyes seem to glow in the darkness, and her dark purple lips are set in a menacing smile. She is dressed in leather armor and a midnight blue gambeson, studded with silver like stars on the night sky. She has three belts on, two holding up a bag around her hips. Her hands are decked with silver, magical rings. The image is encased in a frame in the style of Art Nouveau, labeled as the Tarot 11: Justice.

On the right: This tarot card shows a half-drow woman lying on the floor of a bookstore, dead. This is Sylvia Va'lens, an archmage, a proprietress of multiple business and an alumni of the Octoscholarum, who dedicated herself to research and philanthropy. She is shown bleeding from her eyes, nose, ears, and mouth. A quill lies near her left hand-- she seems to have been writing something before she was killed. Sylvia is dressed in classical mage garb for the city of Ryven: A crisp white shirt with a detachable black collar, a dark purple coat with slit, open sleeves and a vibrant magenta inner lining. Her long, wavy white hair is in disarray and her face is in a blank expression. The pink light outside the window indicates that the scene takes place early in the morning. A cloaked figure stands in front of the windows-- it is unknown whether this person is the assailant or a passerby who discovered the body after the murder. The image is encased in a frame in the style of Art Nouveau, labeled as the Tarot 16: The Tower.

On the left: A woman floats above the dark sea at night. The sky is filled with stars behind her and she is surrounded by fluffy clouds. Her hands are spread out, as if she was basking in the moonlight. She has purple skin bathed in moonlight and her hair is white under the starlight. The woman is nude, except for the dark hood on her head which seems to transform into a shawl and cascade down over her elbows on either side of her. The cloth seems to acquire a cosmic quality towards the bottom, where the cloth turns pink and tiny stars appear. The woman has a halo of eight stars around her head, each star representing one of the eight schools of magic. The image is encased in a frame in the style of Art Nouveau, labeled as the Tarot 02: The High Priestess.

record.text:
Meanwhile I asked ChatGPT Pro to look up the release years of a list of movies and after three tries and 1.5 hours it got nowhere. 

(Gemini did it in two minutes, and I don’t honestly care much about hallucinations on this so it’s good enough.)

The more I think about this, the angrier I get. It takes a particularly virulent strain of sociopathy to sit and let hard-working people serve you a meal knowing that you plan to arrest them and send them off for deportation once they're off of work.

Really depraved shit.

record.text: Chrome 144 deploys Temporal API, ending JavaScript's 27-year Date object dependency. Developers gain native timezone-aware handling with nanosecond precision across 70.5% browser market share. Migration calculus for enterprise teams: bundle size vs. cross-browser strategy. #AdwaitX #Chrome144

external.description: Quick Brief The Release: Google shipped Chrome 144 on January 13, 2026, introducing the Temporal API, <geolocation> element, and ::search-text pseudo-element across its 70.5% browser market share The Impact: Developers gain native access to immutable, timezone-aware date objects after 27 years of Date object limitations, while the declarative geolocation element eliminates JavaScript-triggered permission prompts The Context: Chrome becomes the second production browser to ship Temporal (after Firefox in May 2025), marking mainstream adoption of the TC39 Stage 3 proposal with Safari and Edge timelines still pending…
external.title: Chrome 144 Deploys Temporal API, Reshaping JavaScript Date Handling for 3.98 Billion Users
